properties.body:
BRAZIL-NORTH COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY BY M/V HAWK EXPLORER TOWING
   5.4 MILE LONG CABLES:
   A. 16 AND 17 NOV ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      05-53.22N 048-27.21W AND 04-22.04N 049-47.09W.
   B. 18 AND 19 NOV ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      05-49.47N 048-23.17W AND 04-18.01N 048-43.31W.
   SEVEN MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 20 NOV 12.
